headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Section headings

usage_rules.background: Use bg_main for page background, bg_deep for sidebar
usage_rules.cards: Use bg_cards for containers/widgets with border-borders
usage_rules.primary_action: Use primary_accent for main CTAs (Login, Create, Save)
usage_rules.secondary_action: Use deep_accent or transparent with border for secondary actions
usage_rules.text: Use text_main for primary content, text_muted for labels/meta

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (CSS Grid) for dashboard widgets

cards.style: bg-[#0D192D] border border-[#16213D] rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:border-[#7C63F4]/30 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-[#080F1B] border-[#16213D] text-[#E0CBDE] focus:border-[#7C63F4] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#7C63F4] placeholder:text-slate-600

sidebar.style: bg-[#080F1B] border-r border-[#16213D] h-screen fixed left-0 top-0

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Login page at /login with the floating logo animation.
Implement the Admin Layout with Sidebar and Topbar.
Create the Dashboard Home with summary widgets.
Implement User Management (CRUD) with role assignment.
Ensure ALL colors match the palette exactly. Do not use default Tailwind grays.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
Use Shadcn UI components but override styles to match the dark theme tokens.
Do NOT create a public signup page.
Mock the backend calls for now, but structure the services for easy integration.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can be used for the background.
